item.title: Multiple Object Tracking with Tracktor

item.title: 3D Instance Segmentation
item.description: Autonomous Driving Praktikum 3D Instance Segmentation of the point cloud using 2D detections provided from Mask R-CNN Does not require any annotated 3D data! Original implementation is not suitable for real time due to slow inference speed of Mask R-CNN 2D detections [TODO] LDLS picture We solve the performance issue of LDLS by swapping Mask R-CNN with YOLACT, a faster instance segmentation model. For any given image and LiDAR data pair, we first perform 2D Instance Object Segmentation using YOLACT We then apply LDLS to label the point cloud data with the detected classes in 2D.
